verses.content: Hausakna nasatakhai nêkin hming ṭha hi thlang lem ding a na, Ditsakna ngainatum chu tangka le rângkachak nêka thlang lem ding a nih.
Mi hausa le mi pasie chu an intuok a, An rênga anni siemtu chu LALPA a nih.
Mi var chun thil suol chu a hmuh a, ân bih a, Mi mâwl ruok chu a fe pei a, a tuor pha hlak.
Inngaitlâwmna lâwmman le LALPA ṭîna chu Hausaknahai le inzâkaina le hringna a nih.
Mi dukdaklo lampuia chun hlinghai le chânghai an um a, A lungril vêng ṭhatu chu chuonga inthawka hlataka chun um a tih.
Naupang chu a hraw ding lampuia chun inchûktir la, A hung upat hnung khawma chutaka inthawk chu pêt ngai naw nih.
Mi hausa chun mi pase chunga chun ro a rêl a, Thil pûktu chu ân pûktirtu siehlaw a nih.
Khawhlona thetu chun lunginzîngna sîk a ta, A lunginsenna hmawl chu hlawsam bawk a tih.
Mi tiktlâi chu malsâwmin um a tih, Mi pase kuomah a bei chu a pêk sih a.
Hmusittu chu hnawt suok la, inhalna khawm chu fe suok vêng a tih. Anih, insuolna le inhrilsietna khawm chu bo a tih.
Lungril inthiengna ngainatu chu, A hmûrahai chun lunginsietna a nei a, lal chu ama ruolpa nîng a tih.
LALPA mithai chun mi hriet- na nei mi chu a vawng ṭha a, Mi ringum naw thuhai ruok chu a peithlâk.
Mi thabo chun, “Tuola sawn sakeibaknei a um a, Kawtthlêrhaia sukhlum nîng ka tih,” a ta.
Hmêlmak nuhmei bau chu khur inthûktak a na, LALPAIN a chunga lunginsenna a nei chu chutaka chun tlâng a tih.
Invêtna hi naupang lungrila chun khuopdein a um a, Amiruokchu, sukdikna hmawl chun amaa inthawka hlatakah hnawthmang a tih.
A hlâwkna dinga mi pasie nêksâwr a, Mi hausa kuoma pe hlaktu chu a hung hlawsam tei hlak.
I na sit la, mi var thuhai hi ngai rawh, Ka hrietnaa hin i lungril chu hmang bawk rawh.
Nangma sûnga i vawng ṭha chun thil inhawi a ni sih a, I hmûrhaia chun tungding an ni ve bawk chun.
I ringna chu LALPA a ni theina dingin, Hi ni hin i kuomah, i kuom ngeiah, kân hriettir che hi.
I kuomah thil ṭhatakhai chu ka ziek a ni naw am a nih? Hrietna le thurâwnhai thua chun;
Thutak thuhai a ni chiezie chu inhriettir ding chein, Nangma tirtuhai che kuoma thutak thuhai chu i phurkîr nâwk theina dingin.
Pasie chu a pasiet leiin lâkpêk naw la, Dâikawtkhâra sawisaka umhai chu nêksâwr bawk naw rawh.
An chungthu chu LALPA chun a ṭan ding a ni sih a, Anni suksetuhai hringna chu sukse vêng a tih.
Mi lunginsen hmang chu ruolah siem naw la, Mi nunsie le chun in inkawp ding a ni nawh.
A lampuihai chu hung inchûk i ta, I lungril ta dingin châng hmu rawi i tih.
Kut bentuhai laia mi pakhat ang khawm chu ni naw la, Batnahai dinga intiemkamtu pakhat khawm chu ni bawk naw rawh.
Nangin pêk ding iengkhawm i nei si naw chun, Nanga hnuoia i khum chu ieng dingin am la hmang a ta?
Inhmaa ramri chu sawn hmang naw la, I thlatuhaiin an lo khang ta chu.
Mi a sinthawa taimatak i hmu am? ama chu lalhai hmaah ngîr a tih. Mi hmusitumhai hmaa chun ngîr naw nih.
